title: Google\Cloud\Security\PrivateCA\V1\CaPool\IssuancePolicy\IssuanceModes
name: IssuanceModes
description:
[IssuanceModes][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CaPool.IssuancePolicy.IssuanceModes] specifies the allowed ways in which [Certificates][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate] may be requested from this [CaPool][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CaPool].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CaPool.IssuancePolicy.IssuanceModes

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.allow_csr_based_issuance
params.description: Optional. When true, allows callers to create [Certificates][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate] by specifying a CSR.

params.name: data.allow_config_based_issuance
params.description: Optional. When true, allows callers to create [Certificates][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate] by specifying a [CertificateConfig][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CertificateConfig].
